name: WAY TO CROSS
description:
Find your way through these Islands to the good Guy that will get you outta there :)

HOW TO PLAY

In this game you are Supposed to Complete 10 Levels, you can complete them by Reaching the Finish in a Set Amount of time, there will be a Catch though, there will be some fake Finishes, which means you cannot always get it First Attempt unless ur Lucky Lucky. :)

INFORMATIONS

This game was made for a game jam, the One Minute Jam.

With the goal of Making Every Level (8 LEVELS TOTAL) be completable within 1 Minute of entering the Level.

POSSIBLE ISSUES

- Linux Build might not work as well as the Windows Build. (I had not Tested the Linux Build)

TOTALLY UNNECESARRY

- Added Discord Custom Rich Presence :)
